comments.body: I wonder if we should put a date in there, commit hashes are not ordered
meh, probably not worth it, people shouldn't require untagged dev versions :)
though a comment that all dev versions with the same major number are considered equal would be good, the question could come up when reading the docstring

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@    - Development versions after a1: '1.8.0a1.dev-f1234afa',
                                     '1.8.0b2.dev-f1234afa',
                                     '1.8.1rc1.dev-f1234afa', etc.
    - Development versions (no git hash available): '1.8.0.dev-Unknown'
